name: typedoc-plugin-markdown
description: A plugin for Typedoc that exposes themes and options for rendering markdown.

scripts.compiletests: npm run compiletest:1 && npm run compiletest:2
scripts.compiletest:2: typedoc --tsconfig  tests/src/tsconfig.json --mode file --mdOutFile API.md --options tests/config.core.json --out tests/out/test2
scripts.prepare: rm -rf dist && tsc && npm run copy:static
scripts.prepublish: npm run prepare && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.pretest: rm -rf tests/out && npm run copy:plugin && npm run compiletests

author: Thomas Grey
